alert.note: Alert for Lawrence; Pennington (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued May 12 at 12:22AM MDT until May 12 at 12:45AM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1245 AM MDT FOR SOUTH CENTRAL LAWRENCE AND WEST CENTRAL PENNINGTON COUNTIES... At 1221 AM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Medicine Mountain, or 9 miles west of Hill City, moving north at 30 mph. HAZARD...Ping pong ball size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Locations impacted include... Rochford, Flag Mountain, Deerfield, Deerfield Reservoir and Roubaix Lake. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
